article.title: Softchoice Receives Two Delivery Orders
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Softchoice Corporation, McLean, Virginia, has recently been awarded two delivery orders-$8,739,142 and $8,244,574-against a previously awarded blanket purchase agreement to procure Microsoft brand name software support, known as software assurance. The Marine Corps System Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
